MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-NOV-2020 23:59.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Kirkcolm and surrounding area.  Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still carrying out network investigations on site for the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.15pm on Wednesday 24th November 2020.
